presentation:
Maxime, full-stack software engineer with 5+ years of experience, passionate about React, Node and Typescript ecosystems.

My previous experiences includes :

experiences.smartrenting: Smartrenting: Real estate agency specialized in seasonal and short-term rentals
experiences.carrevolutis: Carrevolutis: Agency focused on digital recruitment events
experiences.4js: 4JS: ERP software editor specialized in high concurrency and high availability environment

focus:
I know how to design, implement and scale business-oriented features.
Design is academic, implementation reflects knowledge, but if you want to scale, you need team-play.

My main focus is to deliver the best value to my stakeholders while delivering high-quality, scalable, reliable software, with a touch of delightful DX.

lloyd.title: Lloyd
lloyd.description: Lloyd is an ERP developed by Smartrenting in order to automate trivial and non-trivial tasks inherent from subleasing business (prospecting, bookings, cleanings, inventories, ...)
lloyd.stack: React, Redux, Nest, Postgres, Redis, Typescript, AWS

bizzeo.title: Bizzeo
bizzeo.description: Bizzeo is a mobile application created by Carrevolutis intented to manage intended to organize networking and recruitment events for sales

web-ascii-art.title: web-ascii-art
web-ascii-art.description: One-day challenge, toying around HTML canvas api and convolution, render an ascii-art from your camera feed
